highlights: Revenue up 6% to $94.9B, exceeding analyst expectations
iPhone revenue grew 6% to $46.2B driven by iPhone 16 demand
Active installed base of devices exceeds 2.2 billion
Strong double-digit growth in emerging markets
Record September quarter for Mac with $7.7B revenue

transcript_highlights.speaker: Tim Cook
transcript_highlights.text: We're pleased to report revenue growth of 6 percent and a new all-time revenue record in Services during the September quarter.

transcript_highlights.speaker: Luca Maestri
transcript_highlights.text: Revenue grew 6 percent year over year to $94.9 billion, better than we expected.

transcript_highlights.speaker: Tim Cook
transcript_highlights.text: Our installed base of active devices reached an all-time high across all products and all geographic segments.
